title: Gas problem
description: Jeera water reduces gas and bloating naturally.
how_to: Boil 1 tsp jeera in water and drink warm.

title: Acidity
description: Saunf water cools the stomach and reduces acidity.
how_to: Soak 1 tsp saunf in water overnight and drink.

title: Constipation
description: Fiber-rich diet helps smooth bowel movement.
how_to: Eat papaya or 1 tsp isabgol with warm water.

title: Loose motions
description: Bananas and ORS help restore electrolytes.
how_to: Eat 1 banana + sip ORS slowly.

title: Indigestion
description: Ajwain reduces gas and indigestion symptoms.
how_to: Chew 1/2 tsp ajwain with warm water.

title: Hair fall
description: Onion juice improves scalp circulation.
how_to: Apply onion juice 20 mins before bath.

title: Dandruff
description: Neem leaves kill scalp fungus.
how_to: Rinse hair with boiled neem water.

title: Oily skin
description: Multani mitti absorbs excess oil effectively.
how_to: Apply multani mitti + rose water pack twice weekly.

title: Dry skin
description: Aloe vera gel hydrates dry skin.
how_to: Apply fresh aloe gel before sleeping.

title: Pimples
description: Tea tree oil helps reduce acne-causing bacteria.
how_to: Apply diluted tea tree oil on pimples.

title: Skin dullness
description: Turmeric brightens skin naturally.
how_to: Apply haldi + curd mask weekly.

title: Dark circles
description: Cucumber cools skin and reduces dark circles.
how_to: Place chilled cucumber slices for 10 mins.

title: High blood pressure
description: Garlic helps control blood pressure naturally.
how_to: Eat 1 raw garlic clove morning empty stomach.

title: Low blood pressure
description: Salt water increases BP instantly.
how_to: Drink a pinch of salt in water.

title: High blood sugar
description: Karela juice helps regulate blood sugar levels.
how_to: Drink 50 ml karela juice empty stomach.

title: Low energy
description: Honey provides a quick natural energy boost.
how_to: Take 1 spoon honey in warm water.

title: Fatigue
description: Dates improve stamina and reduce tiredness.
how_to: Eat 3 dates daily.

title: Better sleep
description: Warm milk relaxes the mind for better sleep.
how_to: Drink warm milk before bed.

title: Stress
description: Ashwagandha reduces stress and anxiety.
how_to: Take ashwagandha powder with warm milk.

title: Headache
description: Peppermint oil reduces headache naturally.
how_to: Apply diluted peppermint oil on temples.

title: Cold & cough
description: Ginger boosts immunity and soothes throat irritation.
how_to: Drink ginger + honey tea twice daily.

title: Sore throat
description: Salt water gargle reduces throat pain and swelling.
how_to: Gargle warm salt water twice.

title: Fever weakness
description: Coriander water helps reduce fever discomfort.
how_to: Drink coriander seed water warm.

title: Chest congestion
description: Steam inhalation loosens mucus and clears chest.
how_to: Inhale steam for 5 minutes.

title: Shortness of breath
description: Cardamom supports breathing and relaxes airways.
how_to: Chew 1 cardamom slowly.

title: Allergy sneezing
description: Tulsi helps reduce allergy-triggered sneezing.
how_to: Drink tulsi leaves in warm water.

title: Eye strain
description: Cold rose water soothes strained and tired eyes.
how_to: Place cotton pads soaked in rose water for 5 mins.

title: Dry eyes
description: Castor oil improves moisture in eyes naturally.
how_to: Apply a tiny drop on eyelids before sleep.

title: Period pain
description: Ajwain tea relaxes muscles and reduces menstrual cramps.
how_to: Boil 1 tsp ajwain in water and drink warm.

title: Irregular periods
description: Cinnamon balances hormones naturally.
how_to: Drink cinnamon water morning and evening.

title: White discharge
description: Fenugreek helps reduce excess white discharge.
how_to: Drink warm methi water every morning.

title: Pregnancy nausea
description: Ginger relieves early-pregnancy nausea safely.
how_to: Chew a small ginger piece slowly.

title: Sleep anxiety
description: Chamomile tea relaxes the nervous system.
how_to: Drink chamomile tea before bed.

title: Overthinking
description: Brahmi helps calm excessive thoughts.
how_to: Take brahmi with warm milk before sleep.

title: Irritability
description: Green tea improves mood and reduces irritation.
how_to: Drink a cup of green tea daily.

title: Anger issues
description: Warm water and deep breathing calm the mind.
how_to: Practice deep breathing for 2 minutes.

title: Low appetite
description: Lemon water increases hunger naturally.
how_to: Drink fresh lemon water before meals.

title: Nausea
description: Cardamom helps reduce nausea instantly.
how_to: Suck 1 elaichi slowly.

title: Dehydration
description: Coconut water restores lost electrolytes.
how_to: Drink chilled coconut water.

title: Body weakness
description: Jaggery provides quick energy and reduces weakness.
how_to: Eat a small piece after meals.

title: Leg cramps
description: Potassium-rich banana reduces cramps.
how_to: Eat 1 banana daily.

title: Aching feet
description: Warm water soak relaxes foot muscles.
how_to: Soak feet in warm salt water.

title: Dry cough
description: Honey naturally coats the throat and stops dry cough.
how_to: Take 1 spoon honey slowly.

title: Wet cough
description: Tulsi + ginger tea helps clear mucus.
how_to: Drink tulsi ginger tea twice.

title: Low hemoglobin
description: Beetroot increases hemoglobin levels naturally.
how_to: Drink beetroot juice thrice a week.

title: Anemia
description: Jaggery + sesame seeds boost iron levels.
how_to: Eat 1 spoon til + jaggery.

title: Immunity weak
description: Amla improves immunity and fights infections.
how_to: Eat raw amla or drink juice morning.

title: Skin redness
description: Aloe vera reduces redness and soothes irritated skin.
how_to: Apply fresh aloe gel twice daily.
